response.overview: Dream Town is a feature film that explores the complexities of dreams, the enchantment, and its hidden power manifesting through human consciousness. Following Maya in her adventure at a magical place called Dream Town, meeting Yumi who runs the whole place. Together, they tackle the challenges of reality with help of the characters Maya has made and written for the past years. Dream Town is all about rediscovering your dreams and revisiting the forgotten ones.
response.title: Dream Town
